package com.jikedaquan.reflection;

public class User {
    
    private int id;
    private String username;
    private String password;

    public User() {
    }
    
    public User(int id, String username, String password) {
        super();
        this.id = id;
        this.username = username;
        this.password = password;
    }

    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    public void setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public String getPassword() {
        return password;
    }

    public void setPassword(String password) {
        this.password = password;
    }
    
    public void show() {
        System.out.println("Hello");
    }
    
    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "User [id=" + id + ", username=" + username + ", password=" + password + "]";
    }
}

package com.jikedaquan.reflection;

import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
import java.lang.reflect.Field;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

public class GetClassStruct {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        try {
            Class clz=Class.forName("com.jikedaquan.reflection.User");
            System.out.println("===========æ„é€ ===========");
            //è·å–æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•
            Constructor[] cons=clz.getDeclaredConstructors();
            for (Constructor constructor : cons) {
                System.out.println(constructor);
            }
            //è·å–å­—æ®µ
            System.out.println("===========å­—æ®µ===========");
            Field[] fields=clz.getDeclaredFields();
            for (Field field : fields) {
                System.out.println(field);
            }
            //è·å–æ–¹æ³•
            System.out.println("===========æ–¹æ³•===========");
            Method[] methods=clz.getDeclaredMethods();
            for (Method method : methods) {
                System.out.println(method);
            }
            //è·å–çˆ¶ç±»
            System.out.println("===========çˆ¶ç±»===========");
            Class supperClass=clz.getSuperclass();
            System.out.println(supperClass.getName());
            //è·å–å®ç°çš„æ¥å£
            System.out.println("===========æ¥å£===========");
            Class[] interfaces=clz.getInterfaces();
            for (Class interf : interfaces) {
                System.out.println(interf);
            }
            //è·å–æ³¨è§£
            System.out.println("===========æ³¨è§£===========");
            Annotation[] annotations=clz.getAnnotations();
            for (Annotation annotation : annotations) {
                System.out.println(annotation);
            }
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

package com.jikedaquan.reflection;

//è´­ä¹°æ¥å£(çº¦å®š)
interface Buy{

package com.jikedaquan.reflection;

import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
import java.lang.reflect.Proxy;

//å·¥å‚æ¥å£
interface Factory{
    void product();
}
//ç”µè„‘å·¥å‚
class ComputerFactory implements Factory{

    @Override
    public void product() {
        System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§ç”µè„‘");
    }
}
//åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†å¤„ç†å™¨
class MyInvocationHandler implements InvocationHandler{
    //è¦è¢«ä»£ç†çš„å¯¹è±¡
    private Object proxyObj;
    //äº§ç”Ÿä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
    public Object bind(Object proxyObj) {
        this.proxyObj=proxyObj;
        return Proxy.newProxyInstance(
                proxyObj.getClass().getClassLoader(),
                proxyObj.getClass().getInterfaces(), 
                this
                );
    }
    //ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡å®é™…æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ–¹æ³•
    @Override
    public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable {
        System.out.println("ä»£ç†ï¼šæ”¶æ”¶è´¹");
        Object result=method.invoke(proxyObj, args);
        System.out.println("ä»£ç†ï¼šä»£ç†å®Œæˆ");
        return result;
    }

}

public class TestDynamicProxy {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //åˆ›å»ºä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡ç”Ÿäº§å™¨
        MyInvocationHandler invocationHandler=new MyInvocationHandler();

        //åˆ›å»ºè¦è¢«ä»£ç†çš„å¯¹è±¡
        ComputerFactory computerFactory=new ComputerFactory();
        //ç”Ÿäº§ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        Object factoryProxy=invocationHandler.bind(computerFactory);
        Factory factory=(Factory) factoryProxy;
        factory.product();

        //åˆ›å»ºå¦ä¸€ä¸ªè¦è¢«ä»£ç†çš„å¯¹è±¡(ä¸Šä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹é™æ€ä»£ç†çš„å¯¹è±¡å’Œæ¥å£)
        Customer customer=new Customer();
        //ç”Ÿäº§ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        Object buyProxy=invocationHandler.bind(customer);
        Buy buy=(Buy) buyProxy;
        buy.buyProduct();
    }
}
